Package AndeA1_2022

Class Card

java.lang.Object
AndeA1_2022.Card
public class Card extends Object
This class represents a single game card. This class provides the details of the cards name, energy cost, amount of damage it does to the dragon and how much healing it provides the player The representation of single game card. This class defines a card as a playing card that has a name a mana Cost (how much magic needed to cast it), and the amount of damage that this card will do to the other player.

Read the Assignment Class for Assignment Specification

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int energyCost, int damageDone, boolean damage, String name)
      Constructor for the card. If valueDone and energyCost are negative they are replaced by 1 (not the best solution but the good enough until we cover exception handling later in the semester).

      My solution length: 4 lines
      Parameters:
      energyCost - The amount of energy this spell costs to cast
      valueDone - The amount of damage or healing done by this card
      damage - true is the card does damage, false if it heals the player
      name - the name of this card

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      String representation of the card. In the following format
      Card [name=Critical Hit, manaCost=30, damageDone=250, damage=true]
